Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 20th overall pick, by Montreal in 2003...
Injured on 6/19/2004 with a Ruptured Disc Back, out for full season...
Injured on 4/12/2005 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 6 days...

Injured on 4/20/2008 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Released by Montreal on 5/24/2008...
Drafted in 3rd round, 65th overall pick, by St. Louis in 2013...
Injured on 6/12/2014 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/5/2018, off Leopoldo Ruiz (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/19/2018, off Arthur West (SDP)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Cincinnati on 5/31/2020...
Hit 3 homeruns against Chicago (A), driving in 5 runs on 6/4/2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/2020, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Anaheim on 8/30/2020...
Won Gold Glove at Rightfield in 2020...
